# Overview

This package is aimed to provide a comprehensive understanding to the grant
opportunities in the United States of America. The data of grant information 
is contained, which could be explored with some interactive feature of the
plots in the shiny website.



## Installation

You can install the development version of grant from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("ETC5523-2024/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-sarah-liu17")
remotes::install_github("ETC5523-2024/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-sarah-liu17", subdir = "grant")
```

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
## basic example code
```
